attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want a referendum called to change the voting system for the General Election to a new proportional representation model where my vote actually counts.

The referendum would ask the people which new system to use. Anyone should be free to submit ideas.

After the referendum, parliament to be dissolved and a General Election held using the new rules.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
